content.user_title: Create and edit Word, PDF, and PowerPoint files
content.value_statement: This skill provides comprehensive guidance for working with Office documents. It covers reading, creating, and editing Word documents, PDFs, and PowerPoint presentations, including format conversion and tracked changes.
actual_capabilities: Read and extract content from Word documents using pandoc and python-docx
Create new Word documents with the docx-js library
Extract text and tables from PDF files with pdfplumber
Generate PDFs using the reportlab library
Create and edit PowerPoint presentations with OOXML manipulation
Convert documents between formats including DOCX, PDF, and Markdown
limitations: This skill provides guidance only; it does not execute document operations itself
Requires external tools like pandoc, LibreOffice, and Python libraries to be installed
OCR capabilities require Tesseract to be installed separately

best_practices: Use pandoc for preserving document structure when converting between formats
Install system dependencies (LibreOffice, poppler) alongside Python libraries
Validate OOXML documents after editing to ensure file integrity
anti_patterns: Avoid modifying OOXML files without proper validation
Do not skip installing required system tools for full functionality
Avoid relying on OCR without verifying text extraction quality

faq.question: What document formats are supported?
faq.answer: DOCX, PDF, and PPTX are fully supported with read, create, and edit capabilities.

faq.question: What are the system requirements?
faq.answer: Requires Python with pdfplumber, reportlab, and python-docx. Also needs pandoc and LibreOffice installed.

faq.question: Can this skill edit tracked changes in Word?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill covers OOXML manipulation to view and edit tracked changes in DOCX files.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill only provides guidance. No data is sent anywhere; all processing happens locally.

faq.question: Why is my PDF not converting correctly?
faq.answer: Ensure poppler-utils and LibreOffice are installed. Check that the PDF is not password protected.

faq.question: How does this compare to other document skills?
faq.answer: This skill covers Office documents. Use working-with-spreadsheets for Excel files.
